Headline: Delays Affecting Green Line Trains
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running with delays after earlier fire department activity near Ashland. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with delays after earlier fire department activity near Ashland.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Pink Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Pink Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier fire department activity near Ashland. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Pink Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier fire department activity near Ashland.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
